website_summaries.verdict: Nice fit with a tight seal and good airflow through the snorkel tube; this is a great all-around mask.
pros: straps don't need to be pulled too tight to create a seal
Even seals well around facial hair
Dry tube works well on shallow dives
cons: Corners of panoramic mask can distort peripheral vision slightly
Straps can be short for some larger people

customer_reviews.title: I swim laps in this mask.
customer_reviews.text: Things I love about doing laps in this mask: - Not having to turn my head to breath when I'm doing freestyle. - Breathing at my own natural pace, instead of having to gasp every three strokes. - Not getting pool water in my mouth. - The quiet of staying under the water. - It doesn't fog up anywhere near as much as my goggles. - I don't need to rest as often to catch my breath. I do breath all my air out, and a deep breath in, every breath, to clear the used air. It's good exercise for my lungs. If you're unable to take deep breaths, a full face mask is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Super affordable and work amazingly
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each bought one for our ten day trip to Maui, Hawai'i. We snorkeled everyday. They are amazing. We had a slight issue with fogging but the locals taught us that we were wearing them too high. They need to basically press the bridge of your nose to get the best usage out of them. Once we started wearing them as such we had zero issues. I absolutely loved the unobstructed view that these provide. It was also nice having my snorkel breathing tube close up when we dove under the water. No worries about clearing the tube or inhaling water. All in all I have zero complaints and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Hot Tub Test Successful
customer_reviews.text: On a recent cruise I had seen people using these full face mask/snorkel units and they seem to really like them. So far, I have just tried it in a hot tub and it works perfectly. No leaks, easy breathing and a full view. Most surprising is that you can breathe completely normally through nose and mouth, not possible with a conventional snorkel. Once I have a chance to try it for real snorkeling, I will update my review, but initial trial was a great success.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at Cococay. It does fog up but it was from me breathing too fast. I have not snorkeled in over 30 years. The more I relaxed, the clearer it got. IF you are going to use a GoPro, do some practice videos. I found your forehead has to be in the water or the camera will be bouncing above and below the water line. Didn't realize it till after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! My wife actually returned a different one she got for this one. Hers was way too magnified and distorted her vision. She tried mine and loved it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel mask is good for the price. It worked well as described , Anti-fog worked well, easy use. Only problem for me was the fit. It did leak a little , and I followed the measurement they recommended but for husband is was fine. The design could be better with nose shape. I felt my nose bridge had bruise from the pressure of the mask . If your looking for just an occasional use this was great.
customer_reviews.author: erl

customer_reviews.title: Seamless Switch From Traditional Gear
customer_reviews.text: The switch from the traditional mask/snorkel combination was seamless and surprisingly intuitive. We have used ours multiple times this past summer without a single problem. The straps that secure the mask to your face are comfortable and even with my facial hair I encountered zero leaks. Additionally, long-term wear was also comfortable. The visibility is vastly improved when compared to a traditional mask. I have yet to find anything about these masks that are not an improvement over traditional gear.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory V

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: The concept is cool but it kept digging up on us no matter what we did. The best thing we could do was tighten it so tight it hurt and then it finally stopped fogging up. I’m sure we were doing something wrong but it should be easy to get something so simple to work right. That and you have to keep you mouth shut which is hard to do. I was clogged up both times we used them so I had to breath out of my mouth. If your in shape and breath slowly it might be great if you don’t mind keeping your mouth totally closed. Just too much of a hassle to get it to work right.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ogee

customer_reviews.title: Swim like the fish
customer_reviews.text: While a wee bit of water does leak in somewhere through the seal, I'm not too bothered by it. This is definitely a wonderful way to swim in the most comfortable way imaginable. I'm very happy with the product because it beats any other snorkel/mask combo I've had before. I even used it for comfort for just swimming in the resort pool. Great not having to come up for air every 3 strokes!!
customer_reviews.author: Fezzywezzy

customer_reviews.title: These were spectacular !
customer_reviews.text: Recently went to Oahu and our entire family wore these-- EXCELLENT snorkeling mask-- I'm a little claustrophobic so I wasn't sure how I would do-- but the full face makes it WAY less intimidating. No problems with fogging and the fit was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Wenz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: In the past for family vacations and long summers, many a snorkel masks have been purchased. They don't last long. This year decided to spend a little more in hopes of getting something that lasts a whole summer, and simply functions better. I have found it! This is a far superior product than anything at your local superstore. Much better quality, and looks better too. Very pleased with this purchase for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my older kids to use in the pool just for fun. I tried one myself and was so excited to discover I could use it to swim laps without worrying about my breathing. It is a really cool experience. My parents are planning to buy these to take on a snorkeling trip in the Mediterranean. I would say these are awesome for surface snorkeling!! However, I do not know that I would like diving with this (such as we do with scalloping) because the pressure presses in at deeper depths.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for asthmatics!
customer_reviews.text: Worked good when shallow water snorkeling in calm water. I'm asthmatic and could not get enough air when swimming out deeper and fighting waves in ocean. Thought I was going to drown. Friend with same full face snorkel had no issue. I do not recommend this type snorkel if you have any breathing issues. Seem to be issue with type of snorkel, not just this brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: Always have trouble adjusting to a face mask and snorkel, but with the one piece, no adjustment necessary! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Spittin Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely is looking be with this hight tech snorkel mask. Not only can you see everything clear around you but at the same time you dont not need to be worried about breathing or getting water into your mouth. You can breath trough your nose normally.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use this snorkel mask!
customer_reviews.text: I few months ago my husband and I went to Kaui with some friends. The friends we went with had these snorkel mask. They brought some for us to use. When we got home from our trip I new I had to buy these mask. They are so easy to put on and gives you so much ease while you snorkel. It makes to experience so much fun. You can see the fish around you and you can breath with ease. Can't wait to use this mask now that i have my own!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie P.

customer_reviews.title: UNIGEAR 180 snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: I used the snorkel mask on my first cruise. It was great. There were no leaks. It did not fog up at all. I wore it straight from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Useful, but not professional grade
customer_reviews.text: My wife, who is not an experienced diver bought this for its promised ease of use. It worked well in our pool, but when she attempted use in real world Caribbean reef snorkeling the plastic face plate fogged badly. She ended up using a borrowed mask and snorkel instead.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lukacs

customer_reviews.title: Not for large (wide) faces
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of verifying the measurements, the mask couldn't effectively seal over my nose and mouth. It leaked consistently on the sides. I would say if you are close to the maximum range for L/XL (5.1"), be prepared it may still not fit. Try it out in a sink or bathtub before your trip! But if it does fit, it's a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Acheson

customer_reviews.title: great !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best snorkel mask I've used. It was super easy and any skill level can snorkel like a pro. It did start to fog on my last day of snorkeling so I would use defogger next time.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Found Full Face Mask That Doesn't Leak!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 previous tries with other full face masks the Unigear mask does not leak! I use the mask for swimming for excerise. I spend 20 to 30 per session and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sicola

customer_reviews.title: Hinge on the mask broke off.  cheap plastic design on a major stress point of the item.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the 2nd time I used the mask on vacation I noticed a crack on the plastic hinge connecting the snorkel to the mask. It broke off completely. This is a cheap design. this whole area near the connection to the hinge should be made out of stainless steel like the rod it locks onto. Otherwise it's a great mask. Unfortunately I bought the mask 9 months before my trip so it's not covered by a warranty by the time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: jones

customer_reviews.title: I didn't drowned
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes have a problem getting this to seal to my face. But when it does seal it works fine. And I have yet to drowned so there's that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: katie orso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and get claustrophobic when snorkeling and just having a mask for your eyes and a tube to breath out of then this is for you. I panic when under water and can't breath through my mouth. I bought this for snorkeling on the Florida keys and it was great. If you did take water in though it's very difficult to put back on if you're not able to actually stand up in the water. So treading water and putting this mask on would be difficult. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all water out of kids' faces.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this as they don't need to adjust to fit their faces. It keeps water out completely and avoids the problem of always removing goggles when water leaks inside.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these one for myself and one for my husband. We have been snorkeling for about 2 years now using the old style equipment. I loved mine, it fitted perfectly and the visibility was amazing. Sadly my husbands didn't quite fit the same, and we are still tweaking it to make it fit, decided to keep his, even if he doesn't end up wearing it i'll keep it as a spare lol. Had emails from the owner throughout our process, were very helpful, made it a great experience so would definitely buy from the again :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for a cruise we went on a few months ago He loved it and I used it and I loved it too. No water gets in and it fits both of us. We started lap swimming at our local pool and I use it for that. I love it. It makes swimming laps so much easier and I like the fact that my face doesn't dry out with the chlorinated water. I am going to buy myself one
customer_reviews.author: Denise Marks

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am a normal size adult male, 5'11" 190,with the straps let all the way out it still borders on too tight. I use it in the pool to swim laps so it is not much of a problem. If you are larger or wear a hat size over 7 1/2 beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sterner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product that WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Super product that delivered exactly what was described. My son used this and had no issues and it worked perfectly. It was comfortable, fit well, no fogging issues either. Would highly recommend this product for your water sport needs. A+++
customer_reviews.author: TamTam74

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkel!
customer_reviews.text: Best of the inexpensive full face snorkels, this is one to consider. Unfortunately, it's just a bit too small for my wife's face, so sent it back for a refund and purchased the next larger size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Product was recommended by a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these for our family cruise coming up in June 2020. They arrived quickly. They look sturdy and feel comfortable. I will update this review after the cruise to let everyone know if they work without leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Tammera Lipham Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Nice to not have snorkel piece in your mouth!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our pool and they both so far work great. Nice seal, no leaking and you can breathe easily and not have a mouth piece in which is great for my 10 year old who has mild asthma to just breathe normally. Can't comment on longevity but they have been fun so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: so much to see
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a cruise for the island stops and it was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jenilee D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, well made mask.Bought 2, one for me, one for my partner. The measurement guide is accurate. Don't guess, though! I would have bought the same size as my partner if I hadn't taken the time to measure. It makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it is a steal at this price. I would only use this once or twice a year on vacation and it perfectly meets that need. I will be buying another one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Relte Schutte

customer_reviews.title: A great choice
customer_reviews.text: I used these in the waters of eastern Mexico first. They worked really well once you worked out the usual kink and settings. I was even able to fit the large one on my 11 & 8 year old family with adjustments to the straps.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This works MUCH better than traditional snorkeling gear and is comfortable. It does take some adjustment when switching between different people using it, but the adjustment doesn't take long and is easy to do. I used it daily for a week in Maui and didn't have any issues with it fogging up and only leaked when I didn't have it tight enough. The visibility is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Reese

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Every time my son wears this everyone loves it and asks where we got it from. He loves snorkeling at the lake and wears it endlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Tarna Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Worked Really Well, Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: This mask worked really well especially for the price. It did fog a tinny bit, but adding a bit of anti-defogger fixed the issue. Being able to breath normally changed my wife and I's snorkeling experience. Highly recommended, one of the best purchases for our recent trip to Maui.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the foldable model
customer_reviews.text: This snorkel mask is awesome! I finally got one with a foldable feature (I lost a previous one that was detachable on top). The full face view is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Nessy P.

customer_reviews.title: great mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review. I have purchased 3 of these masks now for myself and family members, they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bman

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing laps
customer_reviews.text: I read a bunch of reviews and have to agree this product is awesome for doing laps in the pool. Have used it a few times and perfectly clear and easy to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: David T Hegarty

customer_reviews.title: Works PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: BEST PRODUCT EVER!! snug, but not too tight. Works PERFECTLY....zero fog, no leakage! Perfect for underwater diving. Do NOT hesitate to make this purchase! Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: brandie jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So excited to use this in Mexico! Love to snorkel and this mask is so much more comfortable than a standard mask and snorkel.
customer_reviews.author: Kimjones727

customer_reviews.title: Finally no water leaking in
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price. Comfortable and easy to use. A lot of added (uncomfortable) pressure if you try to go deep with it, so perfect for snorkeling or swimming on the surface
customer_reviews.author: Louis Salmun

customer_reviews.title: great vision
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mask. there is a large field of view and he can attach his gopro to the top and film what he is seeing.
customer_reviews.author: Philwvudavis

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This mask is good quality. The only complaint would’ve that the hinge on the snorkel stabs into your forehead when you tighten the mask for it to fit right
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality used snorkeling in Mexico
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was way better than the normal snorkel gear. I also felt like I lasted longer while snorkeling than I have previously. I did forget the included ear plugs one day and that was not good ! You really need them since your head isn't submerged the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Toasha Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Buoyant! Helps stay afloat
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Kids used them in Bahamas & much easier to use than traditional snorkel mask & tube
customer_reviews.author: MaryK  Sebolt

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product however it did leak once and awhile so im not sure if the product is 100% sound in quality. I would hate to add another piece of plastic to the oceans garbage dump by throwing this away.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G

customer_reviews.title: No fogging  and the straps don’t loosen up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other full face snorkel mask and they don’t hold up I snorkel quite often living in Hawaii the unigear has held up better than the other brands
customer_reviews.author: Steve Chapman

customer_reviews.title: It ok for top water snorkling
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. And kept my face semi dry although it was getting moisture on my face. I didnt go deep because i was afraid it wouldnt hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Latasha

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used his to snorkel when I traveled to different islands on a cruise. It’s woeks really well, doesn’t leak and fits perfectly. Easy to travel with too.
customer_reviews.author: V. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Eager to Use It...
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine and am eager to use it. Just waiting to test it on some saltwater excursions. Then I can really attest to its usage. Photos with a GoPro to follow...
customer_reviews.author: Conch

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask for kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter, perfect fit, she says it is very comfortable to wear and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Great but Limited - Can't use with a beard
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend so we can go diving in our local shores together, while the mask actually works great for me - because he has a beard he's not able to use it for long cause it can't form a seal around his face
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the GF. She used it for the beach trip and it worked well. She was able to be under water to search for shells. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Breathe NO FOG
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to use a regular mask for very long... I have trouble breathing out of my mouth primarily and trouble with fogging, etc. This mask allows you and makes it easy for you to breathe out of both your mouth and your nose! NO FOG! Love it and spend a majority of my vacation time snorkeling now!
customer_reviews.author: emotten

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and had a great experience testing it at a pool- excited to take it to hawaii soon!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth
customer_reviews.text: I took a trip to Cancun and decided to buy it before my trip. This mask was 100% worth it I put it on and spent hours in the ocean relaxin and collecting Shells and exploring under the water. It completely sealed and kept water away from my eyes. It also helped me to breath with out drinking ocean water.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Abilit to breathe under water
customer_reviews.text: This fits good and is easy to breath in. I wish the straps were easier to adjust in back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK, but leaks a bit
customer_reviews.text: The leak seemed to come in through the folding snorkel section, but can't really be sure. When it works it is cool. When it leaks, it really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Berquist

customer_reviews.title: Nice snorkel connector.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. He can breath easy and snorkel connector is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget the GoPro
customer_reviews.text: The GoPro attachment broke after 1 use. But the mask itself is simply awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A good overall product, the only bad part about the mask is a pressure point on the forehead from a hinge.
customer_reviews.author: anthony moore

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We used in Hawaii and had a great time snorkeling! Lost my earring because it hooked so I recommend taking your earrings out first!
customer_reviews.author: sheryl bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Snorkel stays attached when not in use. Other models just snap in place.
customer_reviews.text: First time I have been able to snorkel in years. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the best snorkeling mask I've ever used. Easy and comfortable for adults and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Aztecmami217

customer_reviews.title: Cool products
customer_reviews.text: I bought for me and my wife. It fits perfectly on our heads. Really looks nice Unfortunately we still didn't try to give right comment.
customer_reviews.author: Darko

customer_reviews.title: Best cruise purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: This was fantastic! We snorkeled for hours. You have to press it firmly against your face and exhale with force to clear the CO2 from your mask every few minutes, but definitely worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Two strikes
customer_reviews.text: Item was broken and know shipping costs To return the item exceed 75% of the cost. The part that came broken was the adapter for the go pro.
customer_reviews.author: wojos

customer_reviews.title: great vision
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this mask to anyone going snorkeling... the vision is great and it did not leak...
customer_reviews.author: william agler

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: This is our first full face mask. It worked great for both my husband and me. It did not fog and no water got in. We used it for snorkeling in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Crites

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My nine years old son used with no issues at all: he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio Manetti

customer_reviews.title: GREAT NEW LOOKS...OUT OF THE 20TH CENTURY INTO THE 21ST!
customer_reviews.text: HATED SEA WATER SEEPING ONTO FACE UNDER MASK. THESE ARE GREAT! AT AGE 76. I LOOK LIKE SOMETHING IN PINK FROM STAR WARS!
customer_reviews.author: BOCA GAL!

customer_reviews.title: RIP off mask
customer_reviews.text: Water came into this mask all the time. It was very difficult to even snorkel. My daughter ended up using her googles
customer_reviews.author: Adriana R. Pallares

customer_reviews.title: Straps hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I could not adjust the straps without damaging them, did not use item, may have been too small, returned item.
customer_reviews.author: MARK NATHAN

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our cruise and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is such a better fitment than the older style mask. I've have used old school masks for years - but these are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: tom & veronica waid

customer_reviews.title: One size only
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and s/m size for my mother and a l/xl for myself and it's the exact same size. Seems like it would work ok but was confused why it's the exact same size but the box had different sizes on it
customer_reviews.author: Jaime ivan Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask. Our 5 years old very fast learn to use it and still very happy with it. It is important to use only when child knows to swim and dive prior to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Zingman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for snorkeling in Hawaii! My husband didn’t buy one and wished he did. Cheaper to buy than to rent!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: The mask was very comfortable unfortunately the bands do not secure the mask to your face adequately so water gets in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alper

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this for the ocean views!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how clear you can see! Wish I had these sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Doskocil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product until broken... :-(
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I enjoyed it only a few times (less than 5) until one time it just cracked and broke and can no longer be used
customer_reviews.author: A-Z

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Delivery was fast and they kept me updated throughout the whole delivery process. My husband and I look forward to using them on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Papp

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: We used the snorkel for ourTurks and Caicos trip. They were super comfortable and easy to breath from.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Mastroianni

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it. It fits well. Haven't tried it in water yet, but seems to seal fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Will buy more of these. So easy to use and love to snorkel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Higdon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a snorkeling trip I was going on and was impressed by how well it worked. No water leaked in. It did not fog up. The mask allowed me to see clearly.
customer_reviews.author: w.wavren

customer_reviews.title: Great product  for price
customer_reviews.text: Fit great cant wait use it at gym swimming pool
customer_reviews.author: Henry King

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, best feature snorkel can collapse to allow for storage in luggae
customer_reviews.author: Don short jr

customer_reviews.title: That it doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks like good quality item
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Water leaks in
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, go to dicks sporting good for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Masked leaked and hard to breath! I tried adjusting straps. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl23

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months then broke
customer_reviews.text: The plastic locking mechanism that secures the snorkel in the vertical position broke after less that 20 times used. I am a 70 year old male who gently used this product to swim laps at the local rec center. Bought snorkel mask from Amazon Prime 2/1/2019; it broke 3/30/2019. It is manufactured by Unigear. I had planned to use this product during a snorkeling vacation trip to Mexico in May 2019. Guess not!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Burns

customer_reviews.title: painfully dug into my forehead
customer_reviews.text: The hinge on the snorkel painfully dug into my forehead - returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: I loved it the first time. Viewing is great but on second use , IT LEAKED TERRIBLE . The leak was in the breathing vent. So disappointed and past the time to return. We ordered 3 of them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinge quality on snorkel.
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and I was excited about the built on GoPro mount. I bought it for my trip to the Florida Keys and as soon as I unfolded the snorkel portion the hinge broke rendering the entire thing useless. Very disappointed that I ended up having to use a standard snorkel and mask and am unable to return it as it’s past it’s 30 window. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clamp is cheap and will break
customer_reviews.text: The one time I used it on vacation I loved it but it broke soon after. Cheap plastic clamp that breaks easily. I have purchased 4 of these before any broke and then 2 out of 4 broke in the same spot on the cheap clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Unigear 180° Full Face Snorkel Mask -Panoramic View with Detachable for Camera Mount and Earplug,Anti-Fog Anti-Leak Snorkeling Design for Adults and Youth
product_meta.description:
Unigear 180° Full Face Snorkel Mask -Panoramic view with Detachable for Camera Mount and Earplug,Anti-Fog Anti-Leak Snorkeling Design For Adults And Kid

WHAT'S INCLUDE:
1 x Snorkeling Mask
1 X Packing Bag For The Mask
2 x Black Earplug
1 x Camera Mount
1 x Screw Sets
1 X User Manual

STOCK ADVICE:
Wash the mask by hand with washing-up liquid, dry it and store the mask in its net to let the air get to it. Do not wash in the dishwasher

RESTRICTED USE:
The snorkeling mask is intended for snorkeling or surface diving only
(It is NOT for freediving, scuba diving or strenuous open sea swimming)

HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE:
Please measure from the bridge of your nose to your chin
If the measurement is less than 4.7 inches（12cm), choose S/M size,
If it is greater than 4.7inches(12cm),choose the L/XL size.
feature_bullets: 180°FULL FACE DESIGN: Our snorkel mask provides 180º Panoramic view, makes it easier than ever to breathe comfortably through your mouth or nose while you are snorkeling. you will see more fish and undersea world than ever before! With a detachable for camera mount you can easily connect your camera and capture the movement around you in hands-free high-definition

FOLDED-SNORKEL DESIGN:Fold the tube by gently push a button,you will never worry about the falling-off or leakage during your snorkeling, This mask will serve you for a long time and perfectly solves the non-folding snorkel masks' problem and the installation difficulties, like easily damaging the buckle and easily lose your snorkel mask

EASY BTEATH & ANTI-FOG DESIGN:Unigear Full face snorkel mask allows user breathe through mouth or nose while snorkeling with no mouthpiece. With 9.3 inches Longer snorkel tube allow you to diving deeper.Separate inhaling and exhaling channels that creates an airflow away from your main viewing Vision that helps eliminates fogging and will keep you snorkeling longer

DRY SNORKEL TECHNOLOGY:A ball at the top of the tube will automatically seal the air valve to stops salt water from getting into your mouth and prevents gagging, Spend less time worrying about water in your mask and more time snorkeling

100% SATISFATION GUARANTEE:If you are not 100% satisfied with this product for any reason, please contact customer service within 60 days, and we will immediately refund your purchase price - no questions asked
